errors.error_description: The 'Requirements' section specifies 'Python >= 3.6', but the library's v3 client actually requires Python 3.8 or newer. Using an older Python version like 3.6 or 3.7 will lead to installation or runtime errors.
correction_candidates: Add a note saying 'Python 3.6 and 3.7 are supported with older versions of this client'.
